tagline: this is all ελληνικά to me
body:
### Welcome to the ελληνικά Language Page.

Many writing systems that we use today descended directly from the alphabet created by Greeks in 800 BC.

* Α α	alpha	[a] [aː](Ancient), [a](Modern) 1
* Β β	beta	[b], [v] 2
* Γ γ	gamma	[ɡ], [ɣ] 3
* Δ δ	delta	[d], [ð] 4
* Ε ε	epsilon	[e], [e] 5
* Ζ ζ	zeta	[zd] [dz], [z] 7
* Η η	eta	[ɛː], [i] 8
* Θ θ	theta	[tʰ], [θ] 9
* Ι ι	iota	[i] [iː], [i] 10
* Κ κ	kappa	[k], [k] 20
* Λ λ	lambda	[l], [l] 30
* Μ μ	mu	[m], [m] 40
* Ν ν	nu	[n], [n] 50
* Ξ ξ	xi	[ks], [ks] 60
* Ο ο	omicron	[o], [o] 70
* Π π	pi	[p], [p] 80
* Ρ ρ	rho	[r], [r] 100
* Σ σς	sigma	[s], [s] 200
* Τ τ	tau	[t], [t] 300
* Υ υ	upsilon	[y] [yː], [i] 400
* Φ φ	phi	[pʰ], [f] 500
* Χ χ	chi	[kʰ], [x] 600
* Ψ ψ	psi	[ps], [ps] 700
* Ω ω	omega	[ɔː], [o] 800


Numeral Only
* ϛ digamma 6
* ϟ koppa 90
* ϡ sampi 900

### Support or Contact

If you are having difficulty with Unicode in your computer programs, contact mike@dene.ca and we’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Language
